headline: 3 Truck Stocks Positioned to Navigate Industry Challenges
summary: The Zacks Transportation-Truck industry is suffering mainly due to lackluster freight demand. We believe stocks like JBHT, SAIA and ARCB are better positioned to escape industry challenges.

headline: 2 S&P 500 Stocks to Target This Week and 1 We Question
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is often seen as a benchmark for strong businesses, but that doesn’t mean every stock is worth owning. Some companies face significant challenges, whether it’s stagnating growth, heavy debt, or disruptive new competitors.
